lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: I want others to feel they can make a difference. Since I cannot be there physically, the next best thing is to help them empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We created a small newspaper for people to read when they go into the doctor's office. The information in the paper is positive and humorous - helping people feel better through laughter.

lender.name: Mary Kay
lender.loan_because: Part of my beliefs, as a pagan, is that each of us should help others when we can. This is one way I am doing that.
lender.occupational_info: Problem solver at a health insurance company

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I love to help those that want to have a better life but do not have the means to attempt it.
lender.occupational_info: Ordering and managing materials.

lender.name: Brott Family
lender.loan_because: Try to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Inspect food products to make sure they are safe to consume. Design newspaper ads.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. What seems like a small amount to me goes a lot farther in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I care for chimpanzees rescued in the US from biomedical research, entertainment, and the pet trade. Visit http://www.savethechimps.org to learn more.

lender.name: Marisa
lender.loan_because: I want others around the world to know people care.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a journalist

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Don't have much money honey, but I have a roof over my head, food on the table, free medical care and a job that I enjoy . My cup runneth over. I want to share the overflow.
lender.occupational_info: I provide love and learning to children of new immigrants while their parents attend English class. I also contribute to students in need of financing in developing countries through education generation.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurship and giving a handup rather than a handout

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I can't just sit here and do nothing while people all over the world are asking for a chance.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I became a fan of micro-financing while studying economics at the University of Oklahoma. The spot on CNN introduced me to KIVA - a very easy way to get involved and help others help themselves.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is a good use of my money and I can loan and loan again.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies with their relations with their shareholders.

lender.name: Jason Shah
lender.loan_because: this is a great way for a college student on a budget to make a sustainable difference, many times over! Also, I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and the role of small businesses in big economic development.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to repair the world - Tikkun Alom.
lender.occupational_info: Create wireless computer chips for new applications - Wireless USB.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around

lender.name: Mack
lender.loan_because: I feel it something God wants me to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a high tech company in Grove City Ohio USA . Its very stressfull work.

lender.name: leonard
lender.loan_because: It would give me joy to see people with desires to become suscussful and fulfill their dreams
lender.occupational_info: Keeping up with the daily demands of the restaurant. Making sure inventory, equipment and employees are up to level daily

lender.name: Hoyle & Janine
lender.loan_because: We believe that entrepreneurs are the driving force behind any economy, and small contributions go a lot further in their hands.
lender.occupational_info: I fix big networks so that computers from different companies can talk to each other. She is a teacher.

lender.name: Ester
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I love
lender.occupational_info: Jazz violinist

lender.name: Randy & M.E.
lender.loan_because: Because we enjoy helping others

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We should help, support, and love one another, after all we are brothers in Christ. I wish I could lend more and help more people; in the mean time I hope that all my friends join Kiva so we may help more folks.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Honda, where I help to create some of the best cars and trucks build. I am a welder "by tittle: because most of the welding work is done by robots. I have been bless by our Lord.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It feels good knowing that I may help to change someone's life. If you have why not give.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I design and manage systems that connect people to each other.

lender.name: Coty
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school to become a counselor.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in as many lives as possible. As a college student, I don't have much money either, but I want to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of elderly people who cannot take care of themselves. At my job, I cook, clean, and do laundry, and I pass medication.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student. I'm still learning alot of things and I have no idea what I will do after school.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I enjoying helping people help themselves.

lender.name: SCOTT
lender.loan_because: I want to help others since I've been blessed with so many opportunities.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Providing loans to others allows them the abilitiy provide for themselves and their families. We are able to provide these opportunities because of the opportunities that we have been afforded. I get very excited when I see the success that these individuals achieve with hard work and a small loan.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I was challenged by one of my pastors to give and take a step of faith in seeing God provide for me and others.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for scientists to use.

lender.name: Dave & Linda
lender.loan_because: The most powerful capital is good will.

lender.name: K Eble
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to have what we have and we want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I build hotels, hospitals and parking garages.

lender.name: Ronney
lender.loan_because: It's feels good to be able to help someone. I would like to believe that those I can help will open themselves to helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I print signs & banners, business stationary, promotional products and novelty items.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I feel it's important to support our communities and the people who make up those communities. For me, the world is our community. We are all on the planet to live, laugh, love and grow. We are all spiritual beings having a human experience together. For me, supporting eachother in our journey is part of that experience.

lender.name: darcy
lender.loan_because: i want to make a small difference in a large world!
lender.occupational_info: i teach high school students about the past, present and future - of our history in America and the World. They also learn about government and economics, here and abroad.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: God put us on the world together now we must stay together.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I have more than most.
lender.occupational_info: I read a lot and study. My main area of interest is Philosophy and I hope to one day be able to teach it to others.

lender.name: Darcie
lender.loan_because: I have been poor - but thanks to where I live, I had the opportunity to work my way out of my poverty. Also because of where I live, I can be a single Mom without any stigma or less opportunity. I want to provide the same opportunities to others to become independent people, despite their geographical location or familial circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I help large corporations create computer systems that grow their business.

lender.name: Isaac
lender.occupational_info: I'm almost 21 and don't have a job at the moment. I used to have a job as a telemarketer, but i needed to finish college to get a better job. As of now, I'm a full time student. I'm planning to start an internet cafe business, though I don't have enough money to consider as a good capital to start the business.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I am willing to help those who are willing to work hard to achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I advocate for the rights of our elderly.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: We really do need to be the change we want to see in this world.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: it provides me a way to give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I lead teams to validation business systems in the medical device field.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Loaning is better than just giving and it promotes self-efficacy; when the loan is repaid, I just loan it back out again.
lender.occupational_info: I do sociological research to help prevent HIV transmission among at-risk populations

lender.name: Gila
lender.loan_because: The small amounts mean almost nothing to me, while they can make a huge impact somewhere else - and I enjoy seeing where the money is going.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance marketing professional, working from home.

lender.name: kapper
lender.loan_because: Most wonderful thing we can do is sharing a little bit with others and giving what we can to whom have needs, so they will do same with those who are in same situations they were previously...

lender.name: Medstudent Wife
lender.loan_because: I can, but many can't
lender.occupational_info: I help make the workplace safe

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women achieve their dreams of being business owners! It is also important they have support and reassurance to do so, so here I am!!
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for is a music publishing company. We help musicians/songwriters collect their money from various sources throughout the world.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate by people that I really admire, and I think this is a promising program.
lender.occupational_info: I am raising my daughter and pursuing a Masters in Social Work.

lender.name: Katie Murphy
lender.loan_because: It is amazing to have the opportunity to be a part of the start and growth of small businesses around the world! Microloans are such a powerful tool because they enable entrepreneurs to attain economic empowerment while retaining personal autonomy.

lender.name: tartx
lender.loan_because: life is beautiful and people need a hand sometimes. Kiva rocks!
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic and mixed media artist looking to help out my fellow artists around the globe. xo

lender.name: Jan and Kevin Kesler
lender.loan_because: We would like to help others, help themselves if we can.
lender.occupational_info: Jan is a Nurse. Kevin is an engineer.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to in turn bless others.
lender.occupational_info: public interest.

lender.name: BMAC
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in so many ways and I want to make a difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: I lead a global organization of people who plan and produce conventions and events.

lender.name: Susan and Simon
lender.loan_because: we want to be able to help others who have not had the advantages we enjoy by the good fortune of living in a country with a good social and health care system.

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: To start a venture or expand a continuing business, sometimes all it takes is a little help from anyone willing to help.
lender.occupational_info: I write technical documentation for a software business. My hobbies include writing short stories, poems, lyrics, and non fictional happenings.

lender.name: Kip
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I write about computers, software, and software companies.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can. And I consider that fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank.

lender.name: cheryl
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a vocation that allows me to support others in many aspects of their lives. We are of one race....the human race
lender.occupational_info: I assist in healing the sick while advocating for wellness. I work in a very busy Emergency Room and in remote communities many miles from my home.

lender.name: Grace Katie
lender.occupation: Registered Nurse - Chemical Dependency and Psychia

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Poverty shouldn't exist.

lender.name: Tom and Deb
lender.loan_because: I know there is a need for financial help. I admire those who want to work for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We repair cars and trucks

lender.name: Gwen
lender.loan_because: I like to support those who are working hard to help themselves. It feels good to help people far away from here, so they know they have friends all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide counselling to help people deal with difficulties in their lives. I help them to heal and create the life they desire.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I am looking to help others who are willing to put in the effort neccessary to help themselves when an opportunity comes their way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer programmer for a major U.S. insurance company working in the area supporting retirement plans.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: It's such a common sense way to share success.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for newspapers and magazines and complete writing and editing projects for corporate and nonprofit clients.

lender.name: Kurt & Anne
lender.loan_because: We are so impressed with the micro-loan model and are excited to be a part of this amazing tool to fight poverty

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I believe it is better to help people
lender.occupational_info: I lead the planning and delivery of computer software projects.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves, by lending money I am encouraging people to be financially independent rather than simply getting hand outs.

lender.name: mustard seed
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends that believe that we need to help make life better for those that are less fortunate than us. We all attend the same church,thus the mustard seed name. We are hoping to have our group grow as well as the funds that we are able to loan and have some fun at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: Our occupations,ages and backgrounds are all pretty varied.

lender.name: Kandis
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of hard work and dedication. On Kiva, I can support individuals that are already dedicated and working hard!
lender.occupational_info: After graduate school, I look forward to a future of travel and contributing to the global society.

lender.name: Betsy and Mark
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a living and to help others in their community.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: To help those who are less fortunate then myself

lender.name: Ryan & Amy
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to see the entrepreneurial and human spirit thriving throughout the world. We work hard and are rewarded for our efforts. The same should be true for each of these folks.
lender.occupational_info: Manager of a finance group and a social worker in the school system in Colorado.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand to get started with a better life
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who are traveling on an airplane

lender.name: Lynn
lender.occupation: Payroll Clerk, Mother, Grandmother, farm wife
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the value of a hardworking person in this world. If one person's life situation can be improved with a small loan then it is well worth the investment. Not only will their lives improve but they support their families and local economies as well.
lender.occupational_info: I work every day at an office as well as raise a family and help my husband on the farm.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and can share with others to encourage their success and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with mental illness and medical problems.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think its important to help those less fortunate and in need, particularly in areas of the world that often gets overlooked. As an immigrant to the states my parents have worked hard and I can relate to those who do as well. I am thankful to have been given the opportunities presented before me and this is my way of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architect. I design and make drawings towards the construction of libraries, music halls, and schools.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I am a woman in business and lived in Liberia for two years. I know how important it is to have capital to increase income.
lender.occupational_info: I provide computer programs to businesses that own buses. Their customers charter the buses to take trips.

lender.name: Joe and Carolyn
lender.loan_because: This was a gift from our daughter. We think it's a wonderful way to help someone in a developing country to make a better life for themselves and their families. It feels good to help people who are trying so hard to have a better life.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: I have traveled a lot- Kiva gives me an opportunity to give back to the countries that have given me so much in life experience. Also, because I see opportunities like Kiva as a chance for individuals to make the economic playing field just a little more level globally.
lender.occupational_info: I educate people- school children, teachers, tourists- about the environment and fresh water.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I print and dye fabric that I sew into quilts.

lender.name: clinical organics
lender.loan_because: to pay it forward

lender.name: Peta & Jeongsoo
lender.loan_because: We are inspired by the strength and courage our fellow human beings show in the world!
lender.occupational_info:
Peta is a scientist by trade - however is currently teaching english to children in South Korea.
Jeongsoo is a film editor lusting for greener pastures....

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: it is a very easy way to make a very big impact in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I just recently graduated from college with degrees in political science and Spanish. I will be attending law school in the fall and am interested in international and environmental law.

lender.name: Hamza
lender.loan_because: (Compiled in 2006): * Almost half the world over three billion people live on less than $2.50 a day. * At least 80% live on less than $10 a day. * The poorest 40% of the worlds population account for 5% of global income. The richest 20% account for 75%. * Based on enrolment data, about 72 million children of primary school age in the developing world were not in school in 2005; 57% of them were girls. And these are regarded as optimistic numbers... * Nearly a billion people entered the 21st century unable to read a book or sign their names. * Less than 1% of what the world spent every year on weapons was needed to put every child into school by the year 2000 and yet it didnt happen. * In 2005, the wealthiest 10% of the world accounted for 60% of total private consumption. The poorest 10%? Just 0.5%. * 1.6 billion people a quarter of humanity live without electricity. * For every $1 in aid a developing country receives, over $25 is spent on debt repayment. * The poorer the country, the more likely it is that debt repayments are being extracted directly from people who neither contracted the loans nor received any of the money. * A mere 12% of the worlds population use 85% of its water (by the way, the 12% in question do not live in the Third World). * ......(extracted from http://www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats)
lender.occupational_info: I make steel.

lender.name: Karalyn
lender.occupational_info: I teach children anywhere from the age of 5-14 subjects such as; reading, writing, science, math, and social studies along with being a good example to my students. I teach them the importance of character, integrity, work-ethic and positive thinking.

lender.name: Glynis
lender.loan_because: It is my duty to help others...just as I have been helped. It is the best way to show love for another.
lender.occupational_info: Electrical product approval for a transportation agency.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Creating a better world starts with each of us. Anyone and everyone can make a difference. For my students, knowing how to make a difference comes from having models of caring behavior, awareness of the needs of others, and a sense of personal responsibility to contribute to making the world a better place. I believe that those of us who are fortunate have the responsibility to help those in need. We are not here just to acquire things for ourselves.

lender.name: Isaac Rau
lender.loan_because:
Microfinance is an incredible idea to me. I'm excited to be involved with it.
In the US, we fret over the exchange rate and how weak our dollar is compared to the British Pound and the Euro, but it's sailing strong compared to the majority of the world's countries. For example, in Azerbaijan and Uganada, several hundred dollars can purchase livestock and feed that can be worked into a profitable business venture - pretty amazing!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to "do something" to help someone, but I didn't feel that I had enough to give. With Kiva I can help people with a small amount of money, but it can make such a huge difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I process paperwork for construction projects, like building bridges or buildings and roads.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I am self emp;oyed and I want others to do the same and succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales professional. I sell many electric power products.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: Leones or dollars, money is key to mans survival, even if it is borrowed. - Sierra Leonean Farmer

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: With a little help from a friend...amazing things can happen!
lender.occupational_info: I am a semi retired elementary school teacher and principal.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's not alot of money to me, but it IS alot of money to someone. It's the least I can do.

lender.name: Markus and Megan
lender.loan_because: the Bible tells me so
lender.occupational_info: it's not enough, but we'll do more some day

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help from time to time - how lucky we are to be able to give a hand up with such a small investment.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from health care - now enjoying traveling, singing and helping where I can.

lender.name: Mykie
lender.loan_because: Kokua
lender.occupational_info: Youth Development and passion for the future

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to help and it makes me feel good to be able too.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because:
Someone here in America, whose name is long forgotten, took a chance on a young immigrant from Scotland by making him a loan to open a store. Because of that chance, my family leads the blessed life it does today. That is why I lend.
I am not a rich man, by U.S. standards. But by the standards of the world, I have much more than I need. So I give this little bit of money, because it is the "easy" part of being a business partner. I know that only YOUR own hard work can make it truly succeed. When my name is long forgotten as a lender, your family and community will remember you and the difference you made in their lives!
I applaud all who have sought out Kiva for a loan, rather than a handout. You are the real heroes on this site. Please don't ever give up!!!
May the god of your choice bless you.
lender.occupational_info: I work to try and provide custom printed course materials, as well as low cost, locally printed, textbooks for the students at The University of Texas at Austin.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: There is too much inequality in the world, and it disturbs me. I have the means to loan, therefore I do.

lender.name: Doug & Karla
lender.loan_because: We want to help people who are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We have a home-based business; exporting frozen vegetables

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I lend because it is simply away to help people who work hard to be successul in their lives .
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that provides navigation information for pilots of airplanes and ships all over the globe. My job gives me the opportunity to travel the world. I live in Parker, Colorado in the United States.

lender.name: SUSAN & BILL
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a great way to help people help themselves! Where could we receive better return for such a small investment?
lender.occupational_info: We are fortunate enough to have reached retirement age and can travel and enjoy our family.

lender.name: MONICA
lender.loan_because: I want to support people less fortunate than me and give them the ability to improve their lives.

lender.name: Farzan
lender.loan_because: Giving away money has no effect other than satisfying someones immediate needs/wants . In fact it is detrimental - especially to relatives!. Helping out someone to make good use of seed money is the way to go.
lender.occupational_info: I help deliver engine-driven generators to customers.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky; I was born in the right place at the right time from amazing parents who have instilled in me a responsibility to help others less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in community development for a mid-sized city just outside of Milwaukee, WI. In my spare time I try and assist neighborhood non-profit groups specifically by providing them with technology that allows them to get a better 'spatial' sense of what is happening in their community. This is done by providing these groups with the ability to create customized digital maps on the Internet (Geographic Information Systems or GIS) that they can use to track positive and negative trends in the areas where they live. I view GIS as a means of developing more informed/more empowered neighborhood leaders since the technology allows them access to information they can easily synthesize, digest and take action on.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Because the KIVA lending program is a great program that impacts the lives of those who are frequently overlooked.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the firm Executive Consulting for the Nonprofit Sector, Inc, a firm that works exclusively with nonprofit organizations in the areas of training, board development, interim management, transitional executive management, and succession planning. "Taking Nonprofit Organizations To Higher Ground In Their Service To Others"

lender.name: Berryl
lender.occupation: Business Sales Rep for wireless industry
lender.loan_because: I Believe
lender.occupational_info: I sell cell phones and other wireless devices. I work in an office building. I am a regional Representative in the Business Channel. I travel by car to do business or I work wirelessly from my home or office..

lender.name: D.C. Douglas
lender.loan_because: I'm in awe of the disparity between the haves and have nots.
lender.occupational_info: Actor in film and television shows. Voice over artist, too.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to help other people. Everybody deserves a chance to go for their dreams and by everyone coming together to lend small amounts we can help turn peoples dreams into reality.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the most fantastic skincare and cosmetics company whose company motto is 'help people help other people' what more can i say....

lender.name: Pepermunt.net
lender.loan_because: Pepermunt.net is a Dutch website for internet users. Ad revenues are donated to non-profit organizations and charities that support or utilize innovative webtechnologies.

lender.name: Bjrn
lender.loan_because:
I think it's a great opportunity to help somebody getting a better life. The personal approach is really interesting compared to aid organisations such as Red Cross, Save the Children etc where you do not get any feedback on how your own dollar was spent.
It's better helping somebody to buy a fishing boat then to give them a fish.

lender.name: Hirohito
lender.occupation: work in the company and raising rice and wheat.
lender.loan_because: I want someone to be active toward their future, to live with others with peaceful minds!
lender.occupational_info: I work to live, not only by myself but hopefully with many people and I wish making a better world all together.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because:
We often take the luxuries that are provided for granted.
It's important to allow other parents the ability to provide for their families.

lender.name: rooruu
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference, that a little from my world can mean so much in a poorer part of the world to people with entrepreneurial commitment and energy. This is a great adventure.

lender.name: mohanbir
lender.loan_because: One can only make a difference one step at a time.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. We all have a responsibility to assist when and where we can.

lender.name: Kathy Morrison
lender.loan_because:
Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow.
-Thorton Wilder
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have a small family owned fruit farm, growing peaches, cherries and apples mainly for local markets.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I wish I could do more.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 14-18 year olds World History and Law.

lender.name: kaki
lender.loan_because: i think it's a good idea to let money flow in this way....we can easily help people improving their lives

lender.name: Sonia
lender.loan_because: because I believe in giving back to those in need, especially when the world has given so much to me.

lender.name: Floyd & Karen
lender.loan_because: it's important to shrink the world to the size of a community . . . and we're all better off when our community prospers.

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: it impresses the chicks.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are in the hospital to do better with swallowing, speaking and thinking.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get started in business without any money, so i am trying to contribute to helping others dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Iam a computer professional, that works with a variety of software, music production, video ect.

lender.name: ntshembo hope
lender.loan_because: i want to start a small business which provides prepaid vending solutions e.g airtime and electricity to locals as well as to serve as a plut form for those wishing go the same route im in need of an amout of $900 U.S about 7200 south african rands to buy the necesary equipments and start up stock
lender.occupational_info: i find and aproach local companies which provides enovative tecknological products which will help inhance the local comunitys lifes by providing services such as mobile banking and prepaid vending

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: its an effective way to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I respond to disasters both natural and man made.

lender.name: Devin & Anabel
lender.loan_because: My wife and I do a project called The Insignificant Project and we see the importance and impact of small dedicated efforts to helping others. I see Kiva as an amazing opportunity to help people create business opportunities that will have long term impact.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance photographer and i shoot primarily music artists, Anabel is a make up artist. We live in Los Angeles and Paris.

lender.name: maggie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others be successful in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Language Arts teacher which means I teach both Reading and English. I work with 7th graders.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: Thanks to Kiva I am now able to help others through out the world that require a little financial push to get a business started, or to improve their business. I am grateful for living in a capitalistic economy; and I feel like all should experience the benefits of capitalism, not the harshness. Kiva allows others to enjoy the nice things of capitalism, which is why I greatly admire the organization.
lender.occupational_info: I work for one of the worlds largest defense contractors performing IT support for their space and business units.

lender.name: Honsell & Shizuko
lender.loan_because: We just want to help someone in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are in our mid 60s and retired.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Good for the soul
lender.occupational_info: Bring Boring Things to Life

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in life and I feel that I can make the greatest impact by lending directly to those in need. I hope that I can make a difference by investing in the success of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the medical field and I am currently applying to MBA programs that have an emphasis in health care management. I hope to one day work for a pharmaceutical or biotech company that values social responsibility as well as profitability.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: it is selfish, really...it helps me feel connected to the rest of the world.

lender.name: K.C.
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I run a small company that installs and fixes computers for small businesses

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I became ill and unable to work; I had/have a long road to getting better and currently putting myself back into school to a career that my current condition will allow. I have very little money and actually loaned via credit card, but when I heard of this organization and given what I have had to face over the past years I have come to a realization that money is nothing. Without your health and the ones you love by your side life is meaningless. Knowing that what little I can give is going to help a family somewhere in the world that needs it is worth any amount of monetary interest.
lender.occupational_info: I was a network engineer until I became disabled. I am currently going back to school to become a teacher which will be less demanding on my health but more importantly I am studying my passion which is physics. I hope that in teaching I can inspire the next generation to learn and make better the world in which we live in through science.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: giving is living

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to work, provide for their families, and contribute to the success of the community they live in.
lender.occupational_info: I help people achieve their goals at work by creating learning resources and making organizational systems easier to navigate.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of changing one's own life.

lender.name: Matt & Niki
lender.loan_because: It's a great opportunity help others while watching a business grow!
lender.occupational_info: Work for a very large company to ensure their financial statements are accurate

lender.name: ZULEKA
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference to anybody out there.
lender.occupational_info: God gave to me, so i wanna help those less fortunate then me.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I can and should and will!

lender.name: julio Barton
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who have less than me and in dedication of my Mother and Father.
lender.occupational_info: I audit companies for quality and environmental systems

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: I was helped with a small loan to open my first business.
lender.occupational_info: My work is a very big part of my life and has helped me define who I am.

lender.name: bpbarnesok
lender.loan_because: Because I have been given much, I too must give; Because of thy great bounty, Lord, each day I live. I shall divide my gifts from thee, with every brother that I see who has the need of help from me. Because I have been blessed by thy great love, dear Lord. I'll share thy love again, according to Thy word. I shall give love to those in need; I'll show that love by word and deed: Thus shall my thanks be thanks in deed.
lender.occupational_info: I provide support for computers and other technology resources in the veterinary medical field.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: I value the individual effort of all of these people to make their lives better.

lender.name: erica
lender.loan_because: i have so i want all to have
lender.occupational_info: i am importer and designer of costume jewellery

lender.name: Imaginary Alpacas
lender.loan_because: I can help others help themselves through Kiva while teaching my daughter to share her good fortune. I truly admire these wonderful people who are able to make their small businesses work and support their families. We can all learn a lot from them.
lender.occupational_info: I care for my family. I help keep my alpacas healthy and spin their wool into yarn. Then I knit or weave it into products I hope to sell to support my family. Alpacas are the stress relief in my life. We are hopeful to be as successful as these entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Mrcia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference! :-)
lender.occupational_info: I perform software testing for different kind of apps (desktop, web, financial...)

lender.name: Kirby
lender.loan_because: It is a simple and powerful way to promote the entrepreneurial spirit and make lives better around the world.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Imagine helping a small business or family in need for about the cost of a dinner at Red Lobster. I am trying to expand my business and so I am hoping this will send me some good Karma.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small 12 room roadside inn. The rooms are small but very comfortable. It is very hard work and I don't make a lot of money but it is fun. I am a single father to a 15 year old boy I adopted from Russia when he was five years old.

lender.name: Chocolate Diamonds
lender.loan_because:
God has blessed me with sooo much, two beautiful daughters and provision beyond my means. "I Love The Lord" so I give as a way of expressing my love for him and his people in need.
Love You All, Tanya

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: God has provided more than I need and allows me the opportunity to joyfully give to others.
lender.occupational_info: I study human parasites, hopefully to improve health for people around the world.

lender.name: Mayra
lender.loan_because: A little money for me can make a big difference in another person's life.
lender.occupational_info: Deal with low income individuals.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I believe in all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor in theater and films. My goal is to do international work that speaks to everyone about the deep and simple truths of humanity.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: To many of us a couple of hundred dollars is a night out with friends, To these budding business owners it is the difference between poverty and a chance at that dream we take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I know live in Changzhou, Jiangsu Province. China and being retired I get to volunteer in various ways. From playing Santa to the homeless at the Salvation Army to helping with fundraising for a couple of small groups.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: Student in journalism program

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I decorate vacant and occupied homes to make them look more appealing to a greater number of potential buyers.

lender.name: aleks
lender.loan_because: i care

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: it helps
lender.occupational_info: I take care of premature babies

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance for a positive future, I hope my small contribution can help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I design computer software that helps young people communicate in their own way.

lender.name: The Miner's
lender.loan_because: God wants everyone to have giving heart! I share because of my love for people.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the daily financial operations of a public library.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I want to help, I would want someone to help me, and I care.
lender.occupational_info: Student in the Criminal Justice field

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I make pretty good money and want to use some of it to help others. Microlending through Kiva seems to be a way to get a big impact and provide maximum benefit for the money I provide.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage large computers for a company that provides information databases to doctors, lawyers, accountants and similar professionals. Instead of having a library of books they can look up their information on the websites we provide.
I help with fixing broken computers and software, upgrading old systems, and installing new computers and software.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help and right now this is the only way I can.
lender.occupational_info: Small business owner

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: After 18 years in the investment world, God has called me to walk with the poor and find ways to connect those in need with those with the means to change lives.
lender.occupational_info: God's call in my life is to help the poor take steps out of poverty thru sourcing and selling beautiful hand crafted items from those in poverty. They are paid fair, living wages, have safe and appropriate working conditions, and do not involve child labor.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: charl
lender.loan_because: I think i can make a difference.I started my own business and would love to give people jobs but i need to expand.I make resin toilet seat with enything u can think inside of them and the demand is big,but because it is handmade it is expensive and i need alot of workers,but money is the problem

lender.name: Beauty Schools Directory
lender.loan_because: The BeautySchoolsDirectory.com team is dedicated to helping people change their lives through education and training in the beauty industry. In the same vein we desire to lend to entrepreneurs who are attempting to make a better life for themselves in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: Our team helps people locate, compare, and contact beauty schools and cosmetology schools. We assist people by connecting them to programs of interest like skin care, make up artistry, barbering and more.

lender.name: Miles Jaffe
lender.loan_because: It's not good fortune if you don't share it.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I loan because all things are cyclical. I loan because I see the world as a neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I help make movie look the way they should in the theater or in your home - dark or bright, cold or warm.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: Through the travels of my job I have seen too many good people who want a better life for them and there family, but need a little help getting there.

lender.name: iPark Valet
lender.loan_because: The importance of synergy!
lender.occupational_info: We manage parking facilities and other related parking operations.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I believe we all have a responsibility to serve others. We live 65 miles from the nearest town which limits any volunteering. Kiva fits.
lender.occupational_info: Raising cattle, horses, making art knives and doing leatherwork.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: Small business is the answer to uplifting the majority of people. Go for it!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help, becauseI can help and because I should help...
lender.occupational_info: R.N.

lender.name: Carlin
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed economically and believe it is my obligation and joy to help those less fortunate than myself. I want to support those trying to better themselves and not relying on the government to improve their lives. I have a lot of respect for an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in custom design work for websites, interfaces... layout and design for improved user experiences.

lender.name: Anette
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving. It makes me feel my life is worth something if I can help somebody else. I prefer giving than receiving. It makes me very grateful and happy to give.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: Freely ye received, freely give.

lender.name: Eric and Amanda
lender.loan_because: it's fun and effective and a gift and keeps on giving.
lender.occupational_info: We do a lot of studying, cooking and things outside.

lender.name: Gavril
lender.loan_because: I know that the most important thing I do in my life is to be of service and I think Kiva is a great way to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I help protect the cyber world from the dark forces.

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: I think mirco leanding is a brilliant idea and a wonderful way to make a big impact on someone's life with a small amount of money.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe giving someone an opportunity to help themselves is the most rewarding way to give.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Its time for me to start giving back the opportunities that were handed to me in life.

lender.name: Steve Young
lender.loan_because: It's a way to demonstrate Gods love in a practical way

lender.name: Rezar & Elona
lender.loan_because: I like to help in someway those who need help, do not have much and are trying to progress their lives and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the biopharmaceutical industry. I support manufacture of medications making sure they are are produced within specification.

lender.name: Ruth,
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be helping someone else.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: KIva was a gift from my Aunt Pookie. I loaned to help expand a cafe because he needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I am 8 years old and in 3rd grade. I like to be outside a lot. I like sledding and running around.

lender.name: Ed R.
lender.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do. I truely believe what you put into the world will come back to you ten-fold. It is our responsibility to leave this world in better shape than we found it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a News Director, which is a person who manages the news department for a TV station.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: This is a perpetual way to give back and make a difference. After your loan is paid back you get to choose someone else to make a loan to - and that continues as long as you want. I can't think of any other way to give money and have it make a difference over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit housing organization that operates a locally based revolving loan fund, not that much different from the KIVA concept. We lend money to those that cannot access funds through traditional venues.

lender.name: Shane and Lea
lender.whereabouts: Cape Town Western Cape, South Africa

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have the ability to impact the lives of others.

lender.name: Nwora
lender.loan_because: I was born in the 3rd world and understand the difference that a few dollars can make in someones life.

lender.name: collins
lender.loan_because: Is to expand my family business.
lender.occupational_info: well I and my wife sell first grade cloths and other clothing materials, down ajangbadi first b/stop ojo, Lagos. And we normally go to neighbouring Benin republic to buy cheap so as to sell and get our margain

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: Tikun olam. We must all help each other to improve our world.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people live a better life and do whatever I can towards eliminating poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a small church overseeing communications, outreach and newcomers' ministires.

lender.name: Brian & Jessi
lender.loan_because: Owning your own business allows you the freedom to enjoy life.

lender.name: Kao
lender.loan_because: Simply because it feels good to give. I'm already sponsoring a child but lending to someone so they can change their lives is such a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Stock Market field. it's a very stressfull environment but compare to what a family can go through everyday to survive, it's really not comparable. This is my way to help them out.

lender.name: Regan
lender.loan_because: I believe we all deserve to experience prosperity and abundance!
lender.occupational_info: I help people create self-awareness so that they may experience their best life! :)

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: These loans positively impact families all over the world

lender.name: REYNALDO
lender.whereabouts: So Jos dos Campos So Paulo

lender.name: Father Clark
lender.loan_because: God has bestowed upon me talents and expects me to share them with those in need.

lender.name: Kitty Donnchadha
lender.loan_because: A little from me goes a long way for them.
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Rob & Jan
lender.loan_because: Seeing the photos, reading the stories... We care and we can help in this way.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: It feels GREAT to be able to help!
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop advertising as well as copywrite for print and web.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can help someone else.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much and I want to pass it along to others. I believe that sometimes all a person needs is a helping hand to get on their way and do great things.

lender.name: Sidney
lender.loan_because: I know how even a small boost can positively impact someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help build homes for people who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Mike, Lynn & Mia
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I should and because I want to help women get ahead whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: Mike & I make short films as often as we can, commercials for television and corporate videos as often as we need to, and I am a painter who sells my work on a regular basis here in California.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I?

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: i work at keeping mommy and daddy busy

lender.name: Phuong
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a great idea and a way to make a difference. I appreciate the opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I write books to help parents help their kids with behavior problems. For example "ADD/ADHD Drug Free", and "SmartHelp for Good 'n' Angry Kids"

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I LOAN BECAUSE I CAN. BUT MAINLY BECAUSE SOMEONE WHO IS TRYING TO HELP THEMSELVES DESERVES A LITTLE HELP
lender.occupational_info: I HAVE STARTED OVER IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES WITH NEARLY NOTHING EACH TIME. MY WORK IS JUST A SKILL NEEDED BY OTHERS, I THEREFORE CAN CHARGE FOR IT. EDUCATION IS NOT NECESARILY THE ANSWER FOR RURAL PEOPLE, HAVING A SKILL/PRODUCT OTHERS NEED IS CERTAINLY THE ANSWER. GET WISE, YOU ONLY HAVE ONE LIFE BUT YOU DO HAVE AS MANY CHANCES AS YOU ARE PREPARED TO TAKE.

lender.name: Ada
lender.loan_because: I have an International Business degree; however, only local citizens and natural resources benefit from my work. KIVA is an excellent way to make an impact far from home.
lender.occupational_info: Manage government programs that benefit natural resources through volunteerism.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: we "are"
